728653f-a.title: Richmond: Castleton Avenue - Clove Road
728653f-a.text:
1287 to 1283 Castleton Ave. (right), north side, east from
Clove Road to Bodine Street. The 3-story house, at the N.E. corner
of Clove Road, standing directly behind the l-story frame store
building is the former A.B. Mersereau house (1874 map).
May 22, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
728653f-a.folder: Castleton Avenue & Clove Road, Staten Island, NY

728652f-a.title: Richmond: Castleton Avenue - Clove Road
728652f-a.text:
1286 and 1284 Castleton Ave. (left), at, and adjoining the
S.E. corner of Clove Road. No. 1286, at the corner, is the Our Lady
Mount of Carmel Roman Catholic Church.
April 9, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
728652f-a.folder: Castleton Avenue & Clove Road, Staten Island, NY

728654f-a.title: Richmond: Castleton Avenue - Clove Road
728654f-a.text:
1316 Castleton Ave., west of the S.W. corner of Clove Road.
April 19, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
728654f-a.folder: Castleton Avenue & Clove Road, Staten Island, NY
